website_summaries.verdict: Recognized for its esteemed brand name, this item is a great fit for those looking for a popular cylinder bag.
pros: Spacious build and wide mouth is optimal for larger hands
Cylinder shape allows bag to rest upright on its own
Mouth stays open with a wire rim, making access to chalk easier
Comes with a brush holder and pocket for storage
cons: Not large enough to fit two hands in the bag at once
Online color is not true to actual color

customer_reviews.title: Good chalk bag
customer_reviews.text: It's a great chalk bag, but the zippered pocket for phones and such is too small to fit modern smart phones, especially if they're in a protective case. My Galaxy S8 is too tall with or without the case. My girlfriend's Iphone (8 or 9) won't fit either. Since I wanted the pocket for my wallet, not my cell, it's perfect. Closure cinches tight so you won't dump chalk all over yourself or your bag. It's a little bulky, but I don't mind. Can easily fit my big dumb hands in it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean E

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend it for those who want to discretely use chalk ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this for weight training to bring chalk in without making a mess and storing it in my gym bag. It keeps everything clean for the must part. I'd recommend it for those who want to discretely use chalk at the gym. Con: it's smaller than I thought it'd be.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Saylor

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: This is great. This is a great addition to my climbing gear for loose chalk. But not ideal for using the chalk ball. Quality of the bag is amazing. Durable and can take some abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sohacki

customer_reviews.title: Small zip pocket.
customer_reviews.text: The zip pocket is great for small things, but an iPhone is not going to fit in this.
customer_reviews.author: C. T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: i use this for my climb and is great, I also saw guy in the "free solo" movie use it LOL
customer_reviews.author: Sam Nam

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, but the bag squishes too easily its always wrinkly and never in that perfect cup you see in the picture. The worst thing is that chalk is always exploding out of my bag. I put it in my gym bag and carry it to the gym open it, chalk EVERYWHERE all the time. Definitely would not recommend, I wish I could return and get a better product, in the process of getting rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Subpar Standard. Not Worth the Money.
customer_reviews.text: Bag is sub-par standard relative to other Black Diamond bags I used over the years in terms of build quality and material use. This is a cheapo bag with a brand slapped on it. Not worth the price & I promptly return it.
customer_reviews.author: James K.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my hands (small/medium size) doesn't allow chalk to fly out. Only down side is that it doesn't come with a chalk sack.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any use. Got it in two days. Real happy after I lost my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Ike

customer_reviews.title: The pocket is a nice to have
customer_reviews.text: Works well holding chalk. The pocket is a nice to have. Chalk does stick to the black so pick your color carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly sized for me (I'm small). Color is much ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly sized for me (I'm small). Color is much brighter than shown, but definitely not a deal breaker. When fully closed the drawstring keeps chalk in well even without a chalk sock for climbing.
customer_reviews.author: chonell p.

customer_reviews.title: The bag that came was not the bag I purchased
customer_reviews.text: The bag that came was not the bag I purchased. The one I received was blue on top and light blue under rather than grey. I prefer the blue/grey color rather than the blue/light blue color bag I received and was disappointed when I received the discolored bag, but it still works as a chalk bag so...
customer_reviews.author: Hunter D.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend and he absolutely loves it! He's an avid climber and he loves the fact that there is a small pouch to put his phone in. It's also the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Paul

customer_reviews.title: Too small to get both hands into
customer_reviews.text: No room to get in two hands to chalk hands evenly. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

product_meta.title: Black Diamond Mojo Zip Chalk Bag
product_meta.description: Black Diamond Mojo Zip Chalk Bag::Ascend to new heights. The Black Diamond Mojo Zip Chalk Bag is our classic, cylinder-shaped bag with a pliable wire rim and reinforced TPU base. Features a rear-zippered pocket for small essentials like keys, a route topo or smartphone. The included webbing belt with quick-release buckle provides fast on and off convenience. Climb to the top with Black Diamond gear.
feature_bullets: Classic cylinder shape with pliable wire rim and TPU abrasion-resistant lower
Zippered pocket for keys, route topo or smartphone
Fleece-lined interior with cinching cord-lock closure
